step1.title: Dental Chart
step1.description: A visual tool that helps dentists mark the condition of each tooth, whether treated or requiring treatment. It provides a structured and clear way to document dental care.

step2.title: Treatment Plans
step2.description: Allows dentists to build a complete treatment plan for each patient, including sessions, steps, and estimated cost. It helps track progress and clearly explain the treatment pathway to the patient.

step3.title: Case Photos
step3.description: Lets dentists upload before-and-after images for dental cases, helping with evaluation, documentation, and showing patients their progress visually.
step3.feature2: Store images per tooth or treatment

step1.title: Prescription Processing
step1.description: Helps pharmacists receive and verify digital prescriptions, then update their status as dispensed or pending. It speeds up the workflow and reduces mistakes.

step2.title: Stock Lookup
step2.description: Allows pharmacists to quickly check medication availability and suggest suitable alternatives when an item is out of stock, improving patient service efficiency.
step2.feature2: Suggest alternatives when out of stock

step3.title: Supply Requests
step3.description: Enables pharmacists to submit requests for medicine supplies from the warehouse and track their status until delivery, preventing stock shortages in the pharmacy.

step1.title: Patient File Access
step1.description: Gives doctors a comprehensive view of each patient's health history, helping them make accurate medical decisions and understand previous diagnoses or allergies without relying on paper files.

step2.title: Appointment Control
step2.description: Allows doctors to manage their booking requests by accepting, declining, or updating appointment statuses. It helps maintain an organized daily or weekly schedule.

step3.title: E-Prescription Writing
step3.description: Enables doctors to quickly create digital prescriptions and send them directly to pharmacies. The goal is to reduce handwriting errors and simplify the dispensing process for patients and pharmacists.
step3.feature3: Send prescription directly to the pharmacy

step1.title: Appointment Management
step1.description: This feature allows patients to book appointments with various medical specialties and easily view both upcoming and past visits. It provides a smooth scheduling experience without the need for phone calls or waiting times.

step2.title: Digital Prescriptions
step2.description: Enables patients to access all their electronic prescriptions in an organized and clear format, helping them understand their medications and usage instructions. Prescriptions can also be downloaded when needed.
step2.feature1: Access all prescriptions issued by doctors

step3.title: Medical Records Overview
step3.description: Provides patients with a centralized view of their full medical history, including lab results, reports, and medical images. It serves as a permanent and easily accessible health reference.
step3.feature3: Secure cloud storage for all medical documents

step1.title: Inventory Management
step1.description: Allows warehouse staff to fully manage medicine stock, including adding new batches, updating quantities, and monitoring expiration dates for accurate inventory control.

step2.title: Pharmacy Supply Fulfillment
step2.description: Enables the warehouse to receive supply requests from pharmacies, approve them, and prepare the required medications for delivery in a timely manner.

step3.title: Monthly Reports
step3.description: Provides detailed monthly reports such as low-stock alerts, expired or near-expired medications, and quantities delivered to each pharmacy, supporting better operational decisions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro1: CureOx builds healthcare software that helps organizations manage clinical and operational data securely. We are committed to protecting the privacy of providers and patients who use our products.
privacy.intro2: This page is a concise representation of the full policy from the original CureOx site and can be extended with your legal team as needed.
privacy.infoCollectText: We may collect contact details, account credentials, usage analytics, and limited technical information about the devices accessing our services.
privacy.howWeUseText: Data is used to provide and improve our products, secure access, respond to support requests, and comply with applicable regulations.
privacy.securityText: CureOx applies technical and organizational safeguards designed for healthcare-grade security, including encryption, access controls, and monitoring.
privacy.contactText: For questions about this policy or data protection, please contact privacy@cureox.com.
